```{r}
library(haven)
library(tidyverse)

dt <- read.csv("C:/Users/lenovo/Desktop/S/DriversLicenseData.csv",
               sep = ";",
               fill = TRUE)



cat_vars <- c("Gender","AgeGroup", "Race", "Training", "Reactions", "Qualified")

dt_long <- dt %>% 
  select(all_of(cat_vars)) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = everything(),
               names_to = "variable",
               values_to = "value")
```

```{r}
ggplot(dt_long, aes(x = value)) +
  geom_bar() +
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(title = "Kategorik Değişkenlerin Bar Grafikleri",
       x = "Kategori",
       y = "Frekans") +
  theme_bw()
```
